name: Halloween Fun Games
description:
Happy Halloween!

Are you ready to go trick or treating with Bones and his friends?
They’ve got some spooky games they want to play with you, you’re not too scared, are you?

Games -

* Trick or Treat
* Soaring Zelda
* Bones Barrage
* Skull Toss
* Catch Spyro
* Zelda’s Potions
* Find Frank

Other Features -

* Spooky Characters
* Game Centre

TRICK OR TREAT -

Now it’s time to go trick or treating!
You’ll have to swap sweets and make matches, to collect your super tasty treats.
Discover new recipes to create the most spooky, scary sweets you can imagine!

SOARING ZELDA -

Zelda’s out on one of her nightly broomstick flights.
She’s testing out a brand new broom, but it’s not working quite right. Every time she gets up in the air, the broom falls back down. She needs your help to make it past all of the abandoned castles!

BONES BARRAGE -

Bones is losing track of his bones!
They’ve been scattered all over the Haunted Forest, and Bones needs your help to put them all back in their rightful place. Can you help him slingshot them into the storage pumpkins?

SKULL TOSS -

Ready! Aim! Fire!
Send skulls soaring through the air, ready to smash through their targets!
See how many skulls you can crack before you run out of them!

CATCH SPYRO -

Catch Spyro as quickly as you can before time runs out!
Watch closely, he’ll rise from the dead, out of the tombstone, and that’s your chance to catch him!

ZELDA’S POTIONS -

Tilt your Zelda’s Cauldron back and forth to catch ingredients for the potions!
Apples are falling from the sky, and it’s your job to catch as many as you can!

FIND FRANK -

Follow the trail all the way until you find Frank!
Don’t get him confused with the other Characters out there, they might not be very happy!

SPOOKY CHARACTERS -

All the Characters want to play with you! You must be popular!
Bones, Spyro, Frank & Zelda can’t wait to start playing, so don’t keep them waiting!

GAME CENTRE -

See how high you can get on the leaderboards!
Get the best score possible and show everyone just how good you are!

Please rate and comment if you enjoy Halloween Fun Games and want to see updates!

Also! Send us any comments on Facebook or Twitter about what you’d like to see in any new updates!

Happy Halloween to all everyone!
